scenes.background: Monica takes a deep breath while Bob continues to look frustrated.
scenes.description: 'Alright, let’s get some feedback from the team. But what if the suggestions are just as ineffective?'

options.text: We should still try. Any input is better than none.
options.analysis: You encouraged trying for feedback, showing good perception and empathy, although your motivation to explore alternatives was moderate.

options.text: If we think the feedback is not useful, we can filter it and focus on actionable items.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical approach to filter feedback, demonstrating balanced empathy and social skills, but the perception and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: I think we need to trust the team’s judgment and at least give their suggestions a try.
options.analysis: You emphasized trusting the team and trying their suggestions, showing strong empathy and motivation, but the perception and self-regulation were moderate.
